name: Rain Away
description:
Game created for LudumDarte 43 - Sacrifices must be made.

2D pixelart runner, with roguelike elements.

We handle Will, a young man from a village whose main livelihood is agriculture. They face a crisis, it hasn't rained for months. Will's only way to restore prosperity to his people is to reach the top of the Volcano, sacrificing himself as an offering to the gods in order to return the rains to their arid lands.

Creators: 

Programmer - Asier Barrio (@hechigames)

Pixel Artist - Luis Guariglia (@GuarigliaLuis)

Music & SFX - Fran Romguer(@fromguer)
